verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:31
verses.text: And in the wilderness, where thou hast seen how that the Lord thy God bare thee, as a man doth bear his son, in all the way that ye went, until ye came into this place.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:32
verses.text: Yet in this thing ye did not believe the Lord your God,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:33
verses.text: Who went in the way before you, to search you out a place to pitch your tents in, in fire by night, to shew you by what way ye should go, and in a cloud by day.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:34
verses.text: And the Lord heard the voice of your words, and was wroth, and sware, saying,
